They fell on to a tomb, smashing its case and severing the heads of two mummies.Chief curator Zahi Hawass told how they then ransacked the souvenir shop. He said: These idiots missed the real treasure and stole from the gift shop instead. The Coptic Museum, Royal Jewellery Museum, National Museum of Alexandria and Mohamed ElBaradei Manial Museum have also been targeted. Mr Zahi Hawass said: "My heart is broken and my blood is boiling."

She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
